analyzed: akasmāt ca ānuṣaṅgikam devagṛhe vānara yūtham āgatam
atha tatra ekasya śilpinaḥ ṛdha sphoṭita kāṣṭha stambhaḥ
arjuna mayaḥ khadira kīlakena madhye yantra nikhātena avastabdhaḥ

original: tatra kadācid vānarayūtho giriśikharād avatīrya svecchayā
analyzed: tatra kadācid vānara yūthaḥ giri śikharāt avatīrya sva icchayā
taru śikhara prāsāda śṛṅga dāru nicayeṣu prakrīḍitum ārabdhaḥ

original: ekas tu tatrāsannavināśaś cāpalād upaviśya stambhe yantracāram
analyzed: ekaḥ tu tatra āsanna vināśaḥ cāpalāt upaviśya stambhe yantra cāram
iti pāṇibhyām eva saṅgṛhya utpāṭitum ārabdhaḥ

original: asti kaścid gomāyur āhāravicchedāt kṣutkṣāmakaṇṭha itaś ca
analyzed: asti kaścid gomāyuḥ āhāra vicchedāt kṣudh kṣāma kaṇṭhaḥ itas ca
itas paribhraman ubhaya sainasya āyodhana bhūmim apaśyat
tad bhaya saṃkṣubhita hṛdayaḥ kim idam

original: śabdaḥ / kva vā kīdṛśo vaiṣa śabda iti /
analyzed: śabdaḥ kva vā kīdṛśaḥ vā eṣa śabdaḥ iti

original: atha sā yadā vāyupreritair vṛkṣāgrais spṛśyate /
analyzed: atha sā yadā vāyu preritaiḥ vṛkṣa agraiḥ spṛśyate

original: sa tu tasyās sārāsāratāṃ jñātuṃ saṃnikarṣam upaśliṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: sa tu tasyāḥ sāra asāra tām jñātum saṃnikarṣam upaśliṣṭaḥ

original: svayaṃ ca kautukād ubhayor mukhayor atāḍayat /
analyzed: svayam ca kautukāt ubhayoḥ mukhayoḥ atāḍayat
gamyam ca etat bhaksyam ca mama
iti avadhārya eka daṃṣṭrayā kṣudhā āviṣṭaḥ pāṭitavān

original: paruṣatvāc ca carmaṇaḥ kathamapi na daṃṣṭrābhaṅgam avāptavān /
analyzed: paruṣa tvāt ca carmaṇaḥ katham api na daṃṣṭrā bhaṅgam avāptavān

original: ity adhyavasya bheryā mukhaṃ vidāryāntaḥ praviṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: iti adhyavasya bheryāḥ mukham vidārya antar praviṣṭaḥ
pratinivartitum aśaktaḥ ntar līna ardha kāyaḥ vihasya abravīt

original: asti kasmiṃścit pradeśe parivrāḍ devaśarmā nāma /
analyzed: asti kasmiṃścid pradeśe parivrāj devaśarmā nāma

original: sa ca na kasyacid api viśvāsaṃ yāti /
analyzed: sa ca na kasyacid api viśvāsam yāti

original: atha kadācid āṣāḍhabhūtir nāma paravittāpahṛt katham iyam
analyzed: atha kadācid āṣāḍhabhūtiḥ nāma para vitta apahṛt katham iyam
artha mātrā asya mayā parihartavyā iti
upagamya tad kālena ca viśvāsam anayat

original: atha kadācid asau parivrājakas tīrthayātrāprasaṅge tena
analyzed: atha kadācid asau parivrājakaḥ tīrtha yātrā prasaṅge tena

original: tatra ca kasmiṃścid vanoddeśe nadītīre mātrāntika
analyzed: tatra ca kasmiṃścid vana uddeśe nadī tīre mātrā antika
āṣāḍhabhūtim avasthāpya ekāntam udaka grahaṇa artham gataḥ
anavarata yuddha śakti sampannayoḥ ca tayoḥ
śṛṅga pañjara antara udbhūta sṛj bahu bhūmau nipatitam dṛṣṭvā
āśā pratibaddha cittaḥ piśita lobha tayā gomāyuḥ tad jighṛkṣuḥ

original: kṛtaśaucaś cāgatas tam uddeśam āṣāḍhabhūmim api
analyzed: kṛta śaucaḥ ca āgataḥ tam uddeśam āṣāḍha bhūmim api
gṛhīta artha mātrā sāram apakrāntam na apaśyat devaśarmā

atha asau kapāla śakala granthika avaśeṣaḥ kañcid grāmam astam
tena api tasya ātmīya gṛha eka deśe sthānam nirdiśya bhāryā

original: yāvad ahaṃ nagaraṃ gatvā suhṛtsameto madhupānaṃ krtvā

original: āgacchāmi / tāvad apramattayā gṛhe tvayā bhāvyam /
analyzed: āgacchāmi tāvat apramattayā gṛhe tvayā bhāvyam

original: atha tasya bhāryā puṃścalī dūtikāsañcoditā śarīrasaṃskāraṃ kṛtvā
analyzed: atha tasya bhāryā puṃścalī dūtikā sañcoditā śarīra saṃskāram kṛtvā

original: taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā pratyutpannamatiḥ kauśalād ākalpam apanīya
analyzed: tam ca dṛṣṭvā pratyutpanna matiḥ kauśalāt ākalpam apanīya
pūrva prakṛtam eva veṣam āsthāya pāda śauca śayana ādi ārambham

original: kaulikas tu gṛhaṃ praviśya nidrāvaśam agamat /
analyzed: kaulikaḥ tu gṛham praviśya nidrā vaśam agamat

original: puṃścali / tvadgatam apacāraṃ suhṛdo me varṇayanti /
analyzed: puṃścali tvad gatam apacāram suhṛdaḥ me varṇayanti

original: asāv api nirmaryādā prativacanaṃ dātum ārabdhā /
analyzed: asau api nirmaryādā prativacanam dātum ārabdhā

original: punar api cāsau pratibuddhas tāṃ madhyastūṇāyāṃ rajjvā

original: asāv api pratibuddhas tathaiva tām ākroṣṭum ārabdhaḥ /
analyzed: asau api pratibuddhaḥ tathā eva tām ākroṣṭum ārabdhaḥ

original: tantravāyas tu śāṭhyād iyaṃ na kiñcin mamottaraṃ prayacchati
analyzed: tantravāyaḥ tu śāṭhyāt iyam na kiñcid mama uttaram prayacchati

original: ity utthāya tasyās tīkṣṇaśastreṇa nāsikāṃ chittvābravīt /
analyzed: iti utthāya tasyāḥ tīkṣṇa śastreṇa nāsikām chittvā bravīt

original: āgatā ca sā tantravāyī dūtikām apṛcchat /
analyzed: āgatā ca sā tantravāyī dūtikām apṛcchat

original: dūtikā tu kṛtanigrahā nāsikāṃ darśayantī sāmarṣam āha /

tathā tu anuṣṭhite nāsikām ādāya apakrāntā

original: kaulikas tu yathāpūrvam eva pratibuddhas tām ākrośat /

original: asāv api duṣṭā bahu dhṛṣṭaram āha /

analyzed: yathā aham kaumāram bhartāram muktvā na anyam para puruṣam

atha asau mūrkhaḥ kṛtaka vacana vyāmohita cittaḥ prajvālya ulkām

original: hṛṣṭamanā bandhavād avamucya pīḍitaṃ ca pariṣvajya śayyām

original: parivrājakas tv ādita evārabhya yathāvṛttam artham abhijñātavān /

original: atha tasyā bhartā nāpito rājakulāt pratyūṣasy āgatya tāṃ bhāryām āha /

original: sā ca duṣṭābhyantarasthaiva kṣuram eva prāhiṇot /

original: nāpitas tam eva tasyāḥ kṣuraṃ pratīpaṃ prāhiṇot /

original: athāsāv ārtaravam ucchaiḥ kṛtvā pāṇinā nāsāpuṭaṃ pramṛjya
analyzed: atha asau ārta ravam ucchais kṛtvā pāṇinā nāsā puṭam pramṛjya

anena aham adṛṣṭa doṣā virūpitā iti

original: virūpāṃ kīlapārṣṇilaguḍair atīva hataṃ paścād bāhubandhaś

analyzed: niṣpāpam ca parivrāj śūlasthānam nīyamānam nāpitam dṛṣṭvā

na arhatha enam a doṣa kartāram nāpitam śūle samāropayitum

eva apatyāni kṛṣṇa sarpaḥ bhakṣayati sma

original: tān āsādya punar āgamiṣyāma iti kathayām āsuḥ /

original: nihatā anena durātmanā prajñāpūrvakaṃ te mīnāḥ /

original: [ abhiyukto yadā paśyen na kāñcid gatim ātmanaḥ /

original: yudhyamānas tadā prājño mriyeta ripuṇā saha //61// ]
analyzed: yudhyamānaḥ tadā prājñaḥ mriyeta ripuṇā saha

original: sa tu sarvamṛgājñāpito ruṣitamanāś cintayām āsa /

anta karaḥ yam mṛtyu mukha praveśaḥ

original: kumārgāpannacitto 'yam asau sapatna iti matvā sahasaiva tasya

original: asti kasyacid rājñas sarvaguṇopetam ananyasadṛśaṃ śayanam /

vāta pitta śleṣma nirodhāt anāmaya tayā snigdha peśala dravaiḥ
sa khaṇḍa guḍa dāḍima trikaṭuka paṭubhiḥ
sthala ja jala ja khecara balavat pradhāna piśita upabrṃhitaiḥ āhāraiḥ

original: tac ca surabhi puṣṭikaraṃ cecchāmy ahaṃ tvatprasādād
analyzed: tat ca surabhi puṣṭi karam ca icchāmi aham tvad prasādāt
asambhāvyam etat tvadvidhānām agni mukhānām daṃśa vṛttīnām

original: sā tu dākṣiṇyāt tathā nāmeti pratipannā /
analyzed: sā tu dākṣiṇyāt tathā nāma iti pratipannā

original: kintu naivākāle na cātimṛdubhāge tvayāsya prahartavyam iti /
analyzed: kintu na eva akāle na ca ati mṛdu bhāge tvayā asya prahartavyam iti
madhu pāna śrama āgata nidrasya rati vilāsa nirbhara suptasya ca
mada śrama nidrā parīta kāyaḥ na āśu
evam avasthāpite prathama pradoṣe eva akāla jñena daṣṭaḥ

original: asāv api parthiva ulmukadagdha iva saṃlīnakukṣipradeśas
analyzed: asau api parthivaḥ ulmuka dagdhaḥ iva saṃlīna kukṣi pradeśaḥ

original: atha matkuṇaś cakitatvād rājavacanaṃ śrutvā śayanād avatīrya
analyzed: atha matkuṇaḥ cakita tvāt rāja vacanam śrutvā śayanāt avatīrya

original: śayyāpālair api svāmyādeśāt sunipuṇam anviṣadbhir vastraṃ
analyzed: śayyā pālaiḥ api svāmi ādeśāt su nipuṇam anviṣadbhiḥ vastram

original: parivartayadbhir antarlīnā mandavisarpiṇī samāsāditā vyāpāditā ca /
analyzed: parivartayadbhiḥ antar līnā mandavisarpiṇī samāsāditā vyāpāditā ca
asti kasmiṃścid nagara samīpe sannikṛṣṭa vivara abhyantara śāyī

original: sa kadācid āhāram anveṣamāṇaḥ kṣapām āsādya kṣutkṣāmagalas
analyzed: sa kadācid āhāram anveṣamāṇaḥ kṣapām āsādya kṣudh kṣāma galaḥ
bhaya bhairava phetkāra rava pūrita diś vivaraḥ itas tatas praskhalan
palāyamānaḥ kasmiṃścid ajñānāt nīlī kalaśe sannipatitaḥ
asau api kṛcchreṇa āyuḥ śeṣa tayā asmāt nīlī kalaśāt samuttasthau
atha asya tat śarīram nīlī rasa rañjitam dṛṣṭvā samīpa vartinaḥ

original: kroṣṭukagaṇāḥ ko 'yam iti bhayataraladṛśas sarvā diśaḥ
analyzed: kroṣṭuka gaṇāḥ kaḥ yam iti bhaya tarala dṛśaḥ sarvāḥ diśaḥ

original: nūnam imāṃ svarūpavikṛtiṃ dṛṣṭvaite palāyantae iti /
analyzed: nūnam imām sva rūpa vikṛtim dṛṣṭvā ete palāyantae iti
atha dhīra cittaḥ tān śanais avādīt
aham ākhaṇḍala ājñayā sakala śvāpada kula pālana kṣamaḥ
siṃha vyāghra citraka vānara śaśa hariṇa vṛṣadaṃśa jambukā

original: āpūryamāṇakukṣiḥ kakṣam iva taṃ jambukapūgaṃ bahiḥ kṛtvā
analyzed: āpūryamāṇa kukṣiḥ kakṣam iva tam jambuka pūgam bahis kṛtvā

original: ekadā tv asau vividhapiśitanāśitakṣud dikṣu sthitānāṃ
analyzed: ekadā tu asau vividha piśita nāśita kṣudh dikṣu sthitānām

original: kroṣṭukānāṃ krośatāṃ ninādaṃ śrutvā tvaritataram uccair ninanāda /
analyzed: kroṣṭukānām krośatām ninādam śrutvā tvaritataram uccais ninanāda

original: atas te siṃhādayas trapayā bhūbhāgadṛṣṭibhājaḥ kaṣṭam aho /

original: kroṣṭāyam ity avadhārya ruṣā taṃ paruṣagiraṃ
analyzed: kroṣṭā ayam iti avadhārya ruṣā tam paruṣa giram

original: asti / kasmiṃścid vanoddeśe madotkaṭo nāma siṃhaḥ prativasati sma /
analyzed: asti kasmiṃścid vana uddeśe madotkaṭaḥ nāma siṃhaḥ prativasati sma

original: atha tair bhramadbhir dṛṣṭas sārthavāhaparibhraṣṭa uṣṭraḥ /
analyzed: atha taiḥ bhramadbhiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ sārthavāha paribhraṣṭaḥ uṣṭraḥ

original: idam apūrvaṃ sattvam iha vane pṛcchyatām /
analyzed: idam apūrvam sattvam iha vane pṛcchyatām
tatas vagata tattva arthaḥ vāyasaḥ bravīt

original: tenāpi yathāvṛttam ātmano viyogas sārthavāhāt samākhyātaḥ /
analyzed: tena api yathāvṛttam ātmanaḥ viyogaḥ sārthavāhāt samākhyātaḥ

original: pañcaṣaḍdivasātikrānte ca kāle sarvae eva tae āhāravaikalyād
analyzed: pañca ṣaṣ divasa atikrānte ca kāle sarvae eva tae āhāra vaikalyāt

original: aham anayā rujā na kṣamaḥ pūrvavad āhāraṃ bhavatām utpādayitum /
analyzed: aham anayā rujā na kṣamaḥ pūrva vat āhāram bhavatām utpādayitum

original: te yūyam ātmārthe 'pi tāvad abhyudgamaṃ kuruta /
analyzed: te yūyam ātma arthe tāvat abhyudgamam kuruta

original: sādhv anujīvivṛttaṃ madupari bhaktiś ca bhavatām /
analyzed: sādhu anujīvi vṛttam mad upari bhaktiḥ ca bhavatām

original: evam uktvā te 'py utthāya saha krathanakena vanāntaraṃ praviṣṭāḥ /
analyzed: evam uktvā te pi utthāya saha krathanakena vana antaram praviṣṭāḥ

original: vināśitā vayam anena svāminā svādhīne 'py arthe /
analyzed: vināśitāḥ vayam anena svāminā svādhīne pi arthe
ayam asmākam viśvāsa upagata śaraṇa āgataḥ vayasya tve nujñātaḥ
śaṣpa bhujaḥ piśita āśinaḥ ca viṣama sambandhāḥ
tena ca ayuktam aśakyam ca etat iti

original: tiṣṭhata yūyaṃ yāvad aham evaitad arthaṃ sampratipādayiṣyāmi /
analyzed: tiṣṭhata yūyam yāvat aham eva etat artham sampratipādayiṣyāmi

original: vayaṃ tu sarvae evāhāravaikalyād andhāḥ parikṣīṇaśaktayaś ca/
analyzed: vayam tu sarve eva āhāra vaikalyāt andhāḥ parikṣīṇa śaktayaḥ ca
svāminā vināśitaḥ sva ātmanā ātmā svādhīne pi arthe
mayā asya abhyavapattiḥ abhayam ca prasādīkṛtam
na go pradānam na mahī pradānam
na ca anna dānam hi tathā pradhānam
etat anyat api pradhānam mahā ṛṣi vacanam

original: [ tyajed ekaṃ kulasyārthe grāmasyārthe kulaṃ tyajet /

original: ayaṃ tāvad etadavasthaṃ svāminam asmāṃś ca dṛṣṭvā svayam
analyzed: ayam tāvat etad avastham svāminam asmān ca dṛṣṭvā svayam

original: evam abhihitavati vāyase siṃho matibhramam ivārpito na kiñcid apy
analyzed: evam abhihitavati vāyase siṃhaḥ mati bhramam iva arpitaḥ na kiñcid api

original: asāv api punas tatsakāśaṃ gatvā kṛtakavacanaiḥ pratyekaṃ
analyzed: asau api punar tad sakāśam gatvā kṛtaka vacanaiḥ pratyekam

original: siṃhāntikaṃ gatair yuṣmābhir evaṃ vaktavyam iti /
analyzed: siṃha antikam gataiḥ yuṣmābhiḥ evam vaktavyam iti

original: tataḥ kṛtasaṃvidas saha krathanakena siṃhasakāśaṃ gatāḥ /
analyzed: tatas kṛta saṃvidaḥ saha krathanakena siṃha sakāśam gatāḥ
deva svāmi śarīram sarvathā rakṣyam asmad śarīreṇa iti
na yuṣmad śarīra upabhoge kṛte pi asmākam kiñcid
tat mad prāṇaiḥ kriyatām prāṇa yātrā iti

original: ābhyāṃ mama viśiṣṭataraṃ śarīram idam upayujyatām iti /

a kalpa kāyaḥ bhavān api iti

original: tad aham apy evam eva bravīmi /

original: evam abhivadann eva dvīpigomāyubhyāṃ vidāritobhayakukṣis sadyaḥ
analyzed: evam abhivadan eva dvīpi gomāyubhyām vidārita ubhaya kukṣiḥ sadyas
asti samudra tīra eka deśe ṭīṭibha dampatī prativasataḥ sma
atha kadācid prasoṣyamāṇayā ṭīṭibhyā bhartā abhihitaḥ
nanu etat eva sthānam vṛddhi karam

original: bhadre / na śakto mahodadhir mayā sārdham īdṛśaṃ
analyzed: bhadre na śaktaḥ mahā udadhiḥ mayā sārdham īdṛśam
bahu a sadṛśam tava samudreṇa balam

analyzed: evaṃvid yasya vijñānam saphalāḥ tasya buddhayaḥ
mitrāṇām hita kāmānām yaḥ vākyam na abhinandati

analyzed: sa kūrmaḥ iva durbuddhiḥ kāṣṭhāt bhraṣṭaḥ vinaśyati

original: asti / kasmiṃścit sarasi kambugrīvo nāma kacchapaḥ prativasati sma /
analyzed: asti kasmiṃścid sarasi kambugrīvaḥ nāma kacchapaḥ prativasati sma
tasya dvau suhṛdau vikaṭa saṃkaṭa nāmānau haṃsau
atha kāla viparyaye dvādaśa vārṣikī anāvṛṣṭiḥ āpatitā

original: kiṃ punaś ciroṣitaṃ priyamitraṃ kambugrīvam āmantrayāvahe /
analyzed: kim punar cira uṣitam priya mitram kambugrīvam āmantrayāvahe

original: tato mām apy asmān mṛtyumukhāt trātum arhathaḥ /

original: tvayā punaś cāpalān na kiñcid vaktavyam /
analyzed: tvayā punar cāpalāt na kiñcid vaktavyam

original: imāṃ tu yaṣṭiṃ madhye daśanair āpīḍaya /

analyzed: evam anayā eva uddhṛtya ṣaṣṭi mātrāṇi yojanāni mahat saraḥ
evam ca niṣpanne tad jalāśaya sannikṛṣṭa nagarasya upariṣṭān

original: tac ca śrutvāsannavināśaḥ kacchapo yaṣṭiṃ tyaktvābhihitavān /

original: pātasamakālam eva tīkṣṇaśastraiḥ khaṇḍaśo vibhakta iti /

analyzed: asti kasmiṃścid mahā hrade mahā kāyāḥ trayaḥ matsyāḥ prativasanti

original: tad ahaṃ pratyutpannamatiṃ yadbhaviṣyaṃ ca gṛhītvānyam
analyzed: tat aham pratyutpannamatim yadbhaviṣyam ca gṛhītvā anyam
a chinna srotaskam hradam saṃśrayāmi iti

original: yadbhaviṣyas tv āsannavināśas tadvacanam anādṛtya nirārambha eva
analyzed: yadbhaviṣyaḥ tu āsanna vināśaḥ tad vacanam an ādṛtya nirārambhaḥ eva
anyedyus ca apayāte na āgatavidhātari matsyabandhaiḥ antar srotaḥ

original: apakṛṣṭe ca jāle tasmin hrade nāpy ekataro 'vaśiṣṭaḥ /

original: evaṃ gate pratyutpannamatir mṛtarūpaṃ kṛtvātmānaṃ jalasya
analyzed: evam gate pratyutpannamatiḥ mṛta rūpam kṛtvā ātmānam jalasya

original: atha kadācit prasūtāyāṃ ṭīṭibhyāṃ tadbhartṛjijñāsayā samudreṇa
analyzed: atha kadācid prasūtāyām ṭīṭibhyām tad bhartṛ jijñāsayā samudreṇa

original: atha ṭīṭibhī śūnyam apatyasthānaṃ dṛṣṭvā paramāvignahṛdayā
analyzed: atha ṭīṭibhī śūnyam apatyasthānam dṛṣṭvā parama āvigna hṛdayā

original: tatas tena pakṣisamājaṃ kṛtvā niveditaṃ tadapatyaharaṇajaṃ

original: sarvae eva vayam ākrandena garutmantam udvejayāmaḥ /

original: asāv api devāsuraraṇanimittam āhūto viṣṇunā garuḍas tat

sva yūthya vyasanam dṛṣṭvā manyum ājagāma
devaḥ pi viṣṇuḥ traikālya darśana sāmakṣyāt tasya antargatam matvā
atha devam dṛṣṭvā sutarām āvigna hṛdayaḥ bravīt

original: yuktaṃ tvayā nāthena satā samudrāpasadān mamāyaṃ paribhava iti /
analyzed: yuktam tvayā nāthena satā samudra apasadāt mama ayam paribhavaḥ iti

original: jñātvā ca devaḥ parihasya samudrasyedam uvāca /
analyzed: jñātvā ca devaḥ parihasya samudrasya idam uvāca
aneka vaḍavāmukha sahasra parikṣīṇa toyam sadyas kariṣyāmi iti

original: iti matvā praṇamya devaṃ samarpitavān iti /
analyzed: iti matvā praṇamya devam samarpitavān iti

original: kṣutkṣāmatanuḥ kṣudhā parigatān tān sacivān āha /
analyzed: kṣudh kṣāma tanuḥ kṣudhā parigatān tān sacivān āha

original: atha tadājñāsamakālam eva te 'raṇye paryaṭanto yadā na kiñcid
analyzed: atha tad ājñā sama kālam eva te raṇye paryaṭantaḥ yadā na kiñcid

original: āseduḥ / tadāsau jambukas taṃ śaṅkukarṇanāmānaṃ karabhaṃ
analyzed: āseduḥ tadā asau jambukaḥ tam śaṅkukarṇa nāmānam karabham
kim atra prāpta kālam manyate bhavān

original: ahaṃ te dviguṇaṃ śarīraṃ siṃhasakāśād dāpayiṣye /
analyzed: aham te dviguṇam śarīram siṃha sakāśāt dāpayiṣye

original: tvayāpy evaṃ vayam ātmā ca saṃvardhitās syur iti /

original: evam abhidhāya siṃhasakāśaṃ gatvā tam āha /

original: tataś caturakas taṃ siṃhaṃ rudhiraraktasarvagātraṃ dṛṣṭvā
analyzed: tatas caturakaḥ tam siṃham rudhira rakta sarva gātram dṛṣṭvā

original: gate ca tasmiṃś caturakas taṃ kravyamukham āha /

original: tvayā punar mama mukham evāvalokitavyam iti /
analyzed: tvayā punar mama mukham eva avalokitavyam iti

original: evam ukte tābhyāṃ kravyam atibahu bhakṣitam /

original: atrāntare siṃhas samprāpto yāvat paśyati sakalaṃ jaṭharapiśitam
analyzed: atrā antare siṃhaḥ samprāptaḥ yāvat paśyati sakalam jaṭhara piśitam

original: evaṃ vadati siṃhe kravyamukho mukhaṃ caturakasyāvalokitavān /
analyzed: evam vadati siṃhe kravyamukhaḥ mukham caturakasya avalokitavān
atha siṃhaḥ bhrū kuṭila mukhaḥ prakaṭita roṣaḥ
athā asau api vṛkaḥ mukha vaivarṇya vepathu vyāpta tanuḥ
a tanu pada vikṣepaḥ kṣipra palāyana paṭuḥ aṭavīm uddiśya jagāma

original: etasmiṃś cāntare kathamapi ca tatsamīpam atha kaścit sārthavāho
analyzed: etasmin ca antare katham api ca tad samīpam atha kaścid sārthavāhaḥ

original: tasya ca sārthāgresaraṃ kaṭāhena galabaddhena karabham
analyzed: tasya ca sārtha agresaram kaṭāhena gala baddhena karabham

original: āgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛtakaviṣādo jambukas taṃ siṃham āha /
analyzed: āgacchantam dṛṣṭvā kṛtaka viṣādaḥ jambukaḥ tam siṃham āha
yāvat adya api piśitam na upabhujyate

asti kasmiṃścid vana uddeśe mahān vānara yūthaḥ

original: khadyotaṃ dṛṣṭvāgnir ayam ity āhāryaiś śuṣkatṛṇaparṇair
analyzed: khadyotam dṛṣṭvā agniḥ ayam iti āhāryaiḥ śuṣka tṛṇa parṇaiḥ
ācchādya prasārita bhujaḥ kakṣa kukṣi vakṣaḥ pradeśān

original: tatraikaś śākhāmṛgas tadgatamanā muhurmuhus tam eva
analyzed: tatra ekaḥ śākhāmṛgaḥ tad gata manāḥ muhur muhur tam eva

original: athāsāv adhamat tasya tad vacanam avamanyaiva /
analyzed: atha asau adhamat tasya tat vacanam avamanya eva

original: punaś ca tenāsakṛd vāryamāṇo naiva śāmyati /
analyzed: punar ca tena asakṛt vāryamāṇaḥ na eva śāmyati

original: kiṃ bahunā / tāvat tena karṇābhāśam āgatyāgatya prabalam
analyzed: kim bahunā tāvat tena karṇa ābhāśam āgatya āgatya prabalam

original: udvejitaḥ / yāvat tena sahasā gṛhītvā śilāyām āvidhya vigataprāṇaḥ kṛto
analyzed: udvejitaḥ yāvat tena sahasā gṛhītvā śilāyām āvidhya vigata prāṇaḥ

original: asti / kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne vaṇiksutau suhṛdau staḥ /
analyzed: asti kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne vaṇij sutau suhṛdau staḥ
tau artha upārjana nimittam viśiṣṭam deśa antaram gatau

original: atha tatra dharmabuddhir nāmaikas sārthavāhasuto yas tena kasyacit
analyzed: atha tatra dharmabuddhiḥ nāma ekaḥ sārthavāha sutaḥ yaḥ tena kasyacid
sādhoḥ pūrva sthāpitam sva bhāgya pracoditam

original: sa duṣṭabuddhinā saha sampradhārya kṛtārthāv āvāṃ svadeśaṃ
analyzed: sa duṣṭabuddhinā saha sampradhārya kṛtārthau āvām sva deśam

original: atha duṣṭabuddhir antaḥkaṭhinahṛdayas svārthasiddhaye tam āha /
analyzed: atha duṣṭabuddhiḥ antar kaṭhina hṛdayaḥ sva artha siddhaye tam āha
bhadra vitta śeṣaḥ yāvat āvayoḥ sāmānyaḥ

original: kintv ekam ekaṃ śataṃ gṛhītvā praviśāvaḥ /
analyzed: kintu ekam ekam śatam gṛhītvā praviśāvaḥ
eka artha tā ca jana spṛhaṇīyā

original: tathā cānuṣṭhite śeṣaṃ kutracit suguptaṃ kṛtvā praviṣṭau /
analyzed: tathā ca anuṣṭhite śeṣam kutracid su guptam kṛtvā praviṣṭau
atha tad varṣa abhyantare duṣṭabuddhiḥ asat vyaya vyasani tvāt

original: bhāgyacchidratayā ca kṣīṇapratyaṃśaḥ punar api ca nidhito
analyzed: bhāgya chidra tayā ca kṣīṇa pratyaṃśaḥ punar api ca
tat api dvitīya varṣa abhyantare tathā eva kṣīṇam
śeṣaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ apahṛtaiḥ samastāni eva āsādayāmi

original: evaṃ matvaikākī bhūtvā tām arthamātrām apanīya pradeśaṃ
analyzed: evam matvā ekākī bhūtvā tām artha mātrām apanīya pradeśam
samīkṛtya māsa atikrānte kāle dharmabuddhim abhihitavān
bhadra sama vibhāgam śeṣa vittasya kurve iti

original: pratipanne ca dharmabuddhinā saha gatvā tam evoddeśaṃ khātakarma
analyzed: pratipanne ca dharmabuddhinā saha gatvā tam eva uddeśam khāta karma
duṣṭabuddhiḥ pāṣāṇena ātmanaḥ śiraḥ tāḍayat abravīt ca
evam paraspara śaṅkayā vivadamānau dharma sthānam upāgatau
āvedite ca tasmin arthe vagate vyakta vyavahāra duścheda tayā
pañca rātra abhyantarāt ca duṣṭabuddhinā adhikṛtānām pratijñātam
sākṣiṇaḥ mama santi atravyavahāra dīnārāṇām iti
taiḥ tu vyavahāra nivartana artham pṛṣṭaḥ
yasya eva vṛkṣasya adhastāt sthāpitam dravyam
atha duṣṭabuddhinā sva gṛham gatena pitā abhihitaḥ
tāta mad hasta gatāḥ te paṇāḥ

original: ahaṃ tu tvām adya rātrau vṛkṣavivare 'smin sthāpayāmi /
analyzed: aham tu tvām adya rātrau vṛkṣa vivare smin sthāpayāmi
prabhāte dharma adhikṛta samakṣam pṛṣṭaḥ tam vibhāvaya iti

original: [ upāyaṃ cintayet prājño hy apāyam api cintayet /
analyzed: upāyam cintayet prājñaḥ hi apāyam api cintayet
paśyataḥ baka mūrkhasya nakulaiḥ bhakṣitāḥ sutāḥ  /

original: asti / kasmiṃścid arjunavṛkṣe bakadampatī prativasatas sma /
analyzed: asti kasmiṃścid arjuna vṛkṣe baka dampatī prativasataḥ sma

original: tatra ca vṛkṣavivarānusārī mahākāyo 'hir asañjātakriyāṇy eva
analyzed: tatra ca vṛkṣa vivara anusārī mahā kāyaḥ hiḥ a sañjāta kriyāṇi eva

original: tena ca nirvedena naṣṭasañjñāv āhārakriyām utsṛjya
analyzed: tena ca nirvedena naṣṭa sañjñau āhāra kriyām utsṛjya
atha tatra ekaḥ kulīrakaḥ tam āha

original: māma / kim adyāpy āhāro anuṣṭhīyatae iti /
analyzed: māma kim adya api āhāraḥ anuṣṭhīyate iti
adhṛti parītasya me kutas āhāra abhilāṣaḥ iti

original: sa tu tasmai yathāvṛttam apatyabhakṣaṇam ākhyātavān /
analyzed: sa tu tasmai yathāvṛttam apatya bhakṣaṇam ākhyātavān
yā iyam nakula vasatiḥ etad prabhṛti avicchinna paramparayā
tathā ca anuṣṭhite nakulaiḥ piśita mārga anusāribhiḥ
pūrva vaira kriyām anusmaradbhiḥ khaṇḍaśas him kurvadbhiḥ
pūrva dṛṣṭa mārgam ādhāvadbhiḥ baka āvāsam gatvā bakasya

original: upāyaṃ cintayet prājño hy apāyam api cintayet /
analyzed: upāyam cintayet prājñaḥ hi apāyam api cintayet

original: iti bruvann api tenāsau nītvā sthāpito vṛkṣavivare /
analyzed: iti bruvan api tena asau nītvā sthāpitaḥ vṛkṣa vivare
atha prabhāta samaye dhi karaṇa prakṛti pratyakṣam
dharma śāstra vacana abhiśrāvitena vanaspatinā yathāprastutam

original: tac ca śrutvā dharmabuddiś cintayām āsa /
analyzed: tat ca śrutvā dharmabuddiḥ cintayām āsa

original: adyāpy aviplutae eva loke dharmabuddir ahaṃ vijane 'smin vanae
analyzed: adyā api aviplutae eva loke dharmabuddiḥ aham vijane smin vanae
iti atra eva vṛkṣa mūle vasthāpitam

original: kintv asmāt sthānād ekānte 'vasthānaṃ kurudhvam / yāvad aham
analyzed: kintu asmāt sthānāt ekānte vasthānam kurudhvam yāvat aham
enam nidhi pālam kṛṣṇa sarpam parājayāmi
iti uktvā āhāryaiḥ śuṣka dāru parṇa nicayaiḥ vṛkṣa vivaram
duṣṭabuddhiḥ tu adhomukhena akṣṇā vilokya vṛkṣa vivara antargatam
vaṇij putram dṛṣṭvā vyathita manāḥ abhavat

original: pradīpte ca vahnau samantata ujjvalībhūtād vṛkṣavivarāt sphaṭitatanuḥ
analyzed: pradīpte ca vahnau samantataḥ ujjvalībhūtāt vṛkṣa vivarāt sphaṭita tanuḥ
pluṣṭa keśaḥ srasta tvac yadā jātaḥ vaṇij

original: tat tu mahad vaikārikaṃ dṛṣṭvā kim idam iti paraṃ vismayam upagatāḥ /
analyzed: tat tu mahat vaikārikam dṛṣṭvā kim idam iti param vismayam upagatāḥ

original: kiñcij jīvitaṃ ca pratyakṣam abhijñāya vaṇikputraṃ papracchuḥ /
analyzed: kiñcid jīvitam ca pratyakṣam abhijñāya vaṇij putram papracchuḥ

original: kim idam īdṛśam agnipatanam adhyavasitaṃ bhavateti /
analyzed: kim idam īdṛśam agni patanam adhyavasitam bhavatā iti

original: anena duṣputreṇāham avasthām imāṃ prāpita iti /
analyzed: anena duṣputreṇa aham avasthām imām prāpitaḥ iti
anantaram dharma adhikṛtāḥ tam artham jñātvā abhihitavantaḥ
duṣṭabuddhiḥ ayam pāpaḥ śūle vataṃsyatām iti
asti kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne kṣīṇa bāndhavaḥ vaṇij sutaḥ
sa deśa antaram artha upārjana nimittam prasthitaḥ
tasya tulā loha sahasra kṛtā vidyate

original: so 'nyasmin vaṇikputrake tāṃ nikṣipya deśāntaram arthopārjanāya
analyzed: saḥ vaṇij putrake tām nikṣipya deśa antaram artha upārjanāya

original: kṣīṇabhāgyatvāc ca tena bahunāpi kālena na kiñcid āsāditam /
analyzed: kṣīṇa bhāgya tvāt ca tena bahunā api kālena na kiñcid āsāditam

original: pratyāgataś ca tāṃ tulāṃ tasmāt prārthitavān /
analyzed: pratyāgataḥ ca tām tulām tasmāt prārthitavān
katham loha sahasra mayīm tulām mūṣakāḥ bhakṣayiṣyanti iti

original: vṛṣyaṃ svādu mṛdu ca lohaṃ katham ākhavo na bhakṣayiṣyanti / iti
analyzed: vṛṣyam svādu mṛdu ca loham katham ākhavaḥ na bhakṣayiṣyanti iti

original: asāv api suparihṛṣṭahṛdayaḥ pādyādipurassarāṃ tasya pūjāṃ
analyzed: asau api su parihṛṣṭa hṛdayaḥ pādya ādi purassarām tasya pūjām

original: tatra snānābhyudyatasya ca tasya svīyaṃ putram ekam
analyzed: tatra snāna abhyudyatasya ca tasya svīyam putram ekam
āmalaka snāna śāṭikā sametam pṛṣṭataḥ preṣitavān

original: asāv api pratyāgacchan dārakam anyasmin mitragṛhe suguptaṃ kṛtvā
analyzed: asau api pratyāgacchan dārakam anyasmin mitra gṛhe su guptam kṛtvā

original: atha bhojanasamaye sārthavāho dārakam adṛṣṭvā samākulamanāś
analyzed: atha bhojana samaye sārthavāhaḥ dārakam a dṛṣṭvā samākula manāḥ
kva asau dārakaḥ tava anupada preṣitaḥ

original: tac chrutvā paramāvigno nirdayībhūtaś ca taṃ bāhau gṛhītvā
analyzed: tat śrutvā parama āvignaḥ nirdayībhūtaḥ ca tam bāhau gṛhītvā

original: anena me dārakaḥ kvāpi gopita iti /
analyzed: anena me dārakaḥ kvāpi gopitaḥ iti

original: yatra tulā lohasahasrasyāsya gehe madīyā mūṣakair bhakṣitā / tatra
analyzed: yatra tulā loha sahasrasya asya gehe madīyā mūṣakaiḥ bhakṣitā tatra
katham dārakaḥ śyenena na apahriyate iti

original: tac ca śrutvā pratipāditavantas te prāḍvivākāḥ parasparasya
analyzed: tat ca śrutvā pratipāditavantaḥ te prāḍvivākāḥ parasparasya
tad tulā tad dāraka dānam iti
